analyzed: aparimitāyuḥ nāma mahāyāna sūtram
evam mayā śrutam

original: ekasmin samaye bhagavān śrāvastyāṃ viharati sma jetavane anāthapiṇḍadasyārāme mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārdhamardhatrayodaśabhirbhikṣuśataiḥ saṃbahulaiśca  #
analyzed: ekasmin samaye bhagavān śrāvastyām viharati sma jetavane anāthapiṇḍadasya ārāme mahatā bhikṣu saṃghena sārdham ardha trayodaśabhiḥ bhikṣu śataiḥ saṃbahulaiḥ ca
bodhisattvaiḥ mahāsattvaiḥ

original: tatra khalu bhagavān mañjuśriyaṃ kumārabhūtamāmantrayate sma |
analyzed: tatra khalu bhagavān mañjuśriyam kumāra bhūtam āmantrayate sma

original: asti mañjuśrīrupariṣṭāyāmaparimitaguṇasaṃcayo nāma lokadhātustatrāparimitāyu[r]jñānasuviniścitatejorāja nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha  #
analyzed: asti mañjuśrīḥ upariṣṭāyām aparimitaguṇasaṃcayaḥ nāma lokadhātuḥ tatra aparimita āyuḥ jñāna su viniścita tejorāja nāma tathāgataḥ arhan samyaksaṃbuddha

original: eva hi tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati sattvānāṃ ca dharmaṃ deśayati | [2]
analyzed: eva hi tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati sattvānām ca dharmam deśayati
śṛṇu mañjuśrīḥ kumāra bhūta
ime jāmbudvīpakāḥ manuṣyāḥ alpa āyuṣkāḥ varṣa śata āyuṣaḥ
teṣām bahūni akāla maranāni nirdiṣṭāni

original: ye khalu mañjuśrīḥ sattvāstasyāparimitāyuṣaḥ tathāgatasya guṇavarṇaparikīrtana nāma dharmaparyāyaṃ likhiṣyanti likhāpayiṣyanti nāmadheyamātramapi  #
analyzed: ye khalu mañjuśrīḥ sattvāḥ tasya aparimitāyuṣaḥ tathāgatasya guṇa varṇa parikīrtana nāma dharmaparyāyam likhiṣyanti likhāpayiṣyanti nāmadheya mātram api

original: śroṣyanti yāvat pustakāgatāmapi kṛtvā gṛhe dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti puṣpa-dhūpa-gandha-mālya-vilepana-cūrṇa-cīvara-cchatra-dhvaja-ghaṇṭā-patākābhiśca  #
analyzed: śroṣyanti yāvat pustaka āgatām api kṛtvā gṛhe dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti puṣpa dhūpa gandha mālya vilepana cūrṇa cīvara chatra dhvaja ghaṇṭā patākābhiḥ ca

original: samantāt pūjābhiḥ pūjayiṣyanti te parikṣināyuṣaḥ punareva varṣaśatāyuṣo bhaviṣyanti |
analyzed: samantāt pūjābhiḥ pūjayiṣyanti te parikṣinā āyuṣaḥ punar eva varṣa śata āyuṣaḥ bhaviṣyanti

original: ye khalu punarmañjuśriḥ sattvāstasyāparimitāyurjñānasuviniścitatejorājasya tathāgatasya nāmāṣṭottaraśataṃ śroṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācaviṣyanti,
analyzed: ye khalu punar mañjuśriḥ sattvāḥ tasya aparimita āyuḥ jñāna su viniścita tejorājasya tathāgatasya nāma aṣṭottaraśatam śroṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācaviṣyanti
teṣām āyuḥ vardhayiṣyati

original: ye parikṣiṇāyuṣaḥ sattvā nāmadheyaṃ śroṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti teṣāmapyāyurvivardhayiṣyati | [3]
analyzed: ye parikṣiṇāyuṣaḥ sattvāḥ nāmadheyam śroṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti teṣām api āyuḥ vivardhayiṣyati  /

original: tasmāttarhi mañjuśrirdīrghāyuṣkatvaṃ prārthayitukāmāḥ kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā tasyāparimitāyuṣastathāgatasya nāmāṣṭottaraśataṃ śroṣyanti  #
analyzed: tasmāt tarhi mañjuśriḥ dīrgha āyuṣka tvam prārthayitu kāmāḥ kula putrāḥ vā kula duhitaraḥ vā tasya aparimitāyuṣaḥ tathāgatasya nāma aṣṭottaraśatam śroṣyanti  /

original: likhiṣyanti likhāpayiṣyanti teṣāṃ ime guṇānusaṃsā bhaviṣyanti | [4]
analyzed: likhiṣyanti likhāpayiṣyanti teṣām ime guṇa anusaṃsāḥ bhaviṣyanti

original: om namo bhagavate aparimitāyurjñānasuviniścitatejorājāya tathāgatāyārhate samyaksaṃbuddhāya,
analyzed: om namaḥ bhagavate aparimita āyuḥ jñāna su viniścita tejaḥ rājāya tathāgatāya arhate samyaksaṃbuddhāya
tat yathā
om puṇya mahā puṇya aparimita puṇya aparimita āyu puṇya jñāna saṃbhāra upacite

original: oṃ sarvasaṃskārapariśuddhadharmate gagaṇasamudgate svabhāvapariśuddhe mahānayaparivāre svāhā | [5]
analyzed: om sarva saṃskāra pariśuddha dharmate gagaṇa samudgate svabhāva pariśuddhe mahā naya parivāre svāhā

original: imāṃ mañjuśrīstathāgatasya nāmāṣṭottaraśataṃ ye kecillikhiṣyanti likhāpayiṣyanti pustakagatāmapi kṛtvā gṛhe dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti,

te parikṣīṇa āyuṣaḥ punar eva varṣa śata āyuṣaḥ bhaviṣyanti

om namaḥ bhagavate etc as para
